00029 class EffectBassBoost:public EffectSimpleMono {
00030 
00031  public:
00032    EffectBassBoost();
00033 
00034    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00035       return wxString(_("BassBoost..."));
00036    }
00037    
00038    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00039       std::set<wxString> result;
00040       result.insert(wxT("http://lv2plug.in/ns/lv2core#LowpassPlugin"));
00041       return result;
00042    }
00043 
00044    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00045       return wxString(wxT("BassBoost"));
00046    }
00047    
00048    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00049       return wxString(_("Boosting Bass Frequencies"));
00050    }
00051    
00052    // Useful only after PromptUser values have been set. 
00053    virtual wxString GetEffectDescription(); 
00054 
00055    virtual bool PromptUser();
00056    virtual bool TransferParameters( Shuttle & shuttle );
00057    
00058  protected:
00059 
00060    virtual bool NewTrackSimpleMono();
00061 
00062    virtual bool ProcessSimpleMono(float *buffer, sampleCount len);
00063    
00064    float frequency, dB_boost;
00065    //filter parameters
00066    float xn1,xn2,yn1,yn2;
00067    float omega, sn, cs, a, shape, beta, b0, b1, b2, a0, a1, a2;
00068 
00069    friend class BassBoostDialog;
00070 };
